document.title: Nonholomorphic Eisenstein series, the Kronecker limit formula, and the hyperbolic Laplacian

para.p:
The Poisson summation formula 2 footnote 2 2 footnote 2 Henri Cohen, Number Theory, vol. I: Tools and Diophantine Equations, p. 46, Corollary 2.2.17. states that if
: f
→ R C
is continuous and of locally bounded variation, then for all
∈ x R
,

Math.text: (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(f * (x + n)) = (sum _ (k element-of Z))@(widehat@(f) * k * e ^ (2 * pi * i * k * x))

para.p: where

Math.text: formulae@(widehat@(f) * xi = (integral _ R)@(e ^ (- 2 * pi * i * xi * t) * f * t * differential-d@(t)), xi element-of R)

Math.text: f * open-interval@(x, y) = y ^ s * (absolute-value@(m * x + n + i * m * y)) ^ (- 2 * s) = y ^ s * (m * x + n + i * m * y) ^ (- s) * ((m * x + n) - i * m * y) ^ (- s)

para.p: Write

Math.text: g * open-interval@(x, y) = (m * x + n + i * m * y) ^ (- s) * ((m * x + n) - i * m * y) ^ (- s)

para.p: We calculate

Math.text: (partial-differential _ x)@(g) * open-interval@(x, y) = - s * (m * x + n + i * m * y) ^ (- s - 1) * m * ((m * x + n) - i * m * y) ^ (- s)
(partial-differential _ x)@(g) * open-interval@(x, y)
absent = - s * (m * x + n + i * m * y) ^ (- s - 1) * m * ((m * x + n) - i * m * y) ^ (- s)

para.p: and

Math.text: ((partial-differential _ x) ^ 2)@(g) * open-interval@(x, y) = s * (s + 1) * (m * x + n + i * m * y) ^ (- s - 2) * m ^ 2 * ((m * x + n) - i * m * y) ^ (- s)

para.p: from which we have

Math.text: ((partial-differential _ x) ^ 2)@(f) * open-interval@(x, y) = s * (s + 1) * m ^ 2 * (m * x + n + i * m * y) ^ (- 2) * f * open-interval@(x, y)

+ 2 * s ^ 2 * m ^ 2 * (absolute-value@(m * tau + n)) ^ (- 2) * f * open-interval@(x, y)

para.p: We also calculate

Math.text: (partial-differential _ y)@(g) * open-interval@(x, y) = - s * (m * x + n + i * m * y) ^ (- s - 1) * i * m * ((m * x + n) - i * m * y) ^ (- s)

((partial-differential _ y) ^ 2)@(g) * open-interval@(x, y)

absent = - s * (s + 1) * m ^ 2 * (m * x + n + i * m * y) ^ (- 2) * g * open-interval@(x, y)
+ 2 * s ^ 2 * m ^ 2 * (m * x + n + i * m * y) ^ (- 1) * ((m * x + n) - i * m * y) ^ (- 1) * g * open-interval@(x, y)

- s * (s + 1) * m ^ 2 * ((m * x + n) - i * m * y) ^ (- 2) * g * open-interval@(x, y)
- s * (s + 1) * m ^ 2 * ((m * x + n) - i * m * y) ^ (- 2) * g * open-interval@(x, y)

para.p: Now,

Math.text: (partial-differential _ y)@(f) * open-interval@(x, y) = s * y ^ (s - 1) * g * open-interval@(x, y) + y ^ s * (partial-differential _ y)@(g) * open-interval@(x, y)

para.p: and

Math.text: ((partial-differential _ y) ^ 2)@(f) * open-interval@(x, y) = s * (s - 1) * y ^ (s - 2) * g * open-interval@(x, y) + 2 * s * y ^ (s - 1) * (partial-differential _ y)@(g) * open-interval@(x, y)
((partial-differential _ y) ^ 2)@(f) * open-interval@(x, y)

+ y ^ s * ((partial-differential _ y) ^ 2)@(g) * open-interval@(x, y)
+ y ^ s * ((partial-differential _ y) ^ 2)@(g) * open-interval@(x, y)

para.p: from which we have

Math.text: ((partial-differential _ y) ^ 2)@(f) * open-interval@(x, y) = s * (s - 1) * y ^ (s - 2) * g * open-interval@(x, y)
((partial-differential _ y) ^ 2)@(f) * open-interval@(x, y)
absent = s * (s - 1) * y ^ (s - 2) * g * open-interval@(x, y)
- 2 * s ^ 2 * i * m * y ^ (s - 1) * (m * x + n + i * m * y) ^ (- 1) * g * open-interval@(x, y)

+ 2 * s ^ 2 * m ^ 2 * y ^ s * (m * x + n + i * m * y) ^ (- 1) * ((m * x + n) - i * m * y) ^ (- 1) * g * open-interval@(x, y)
- s * (s + 1) * m ^ 2 * y ^ s * ((m * x + n) - i * m * y) ^ (- 2) * g * open-interval@(x, y)

absent = s * (s - 1) * y ^ (- 2) * f * open-interval@(x, y)
absent = s * (s - 1) * y ^ (- 2) * f * open-interval@(x, y)
- 2 * s ^ 2 * i * m * y ^ (- 1) * (m * x + n + i * m * y) ^ (- 1) * f * open-interval@(x, y)
- 2 * s ^ 2 * i * m * y ^ (- 1) * (m * x + n + i * m * y) ^ (- 1) * f * open-interval@(x, y)

- s * (s + 1) * m ^ 2 * (m * x + n + i * m * y) ^ (- 2) * f * open-interval@(x, y)

+ 2 * s ^ 2 * m ^ 2 * (absolute-value@(m * tau + n)) ^ (- 2) * f * open-interval@(x, y)
+ 2 * s ^ 2 * m ^ 2 * (absolute-value@(m * tau + n)) ^ (- 2) * f * open-interval@(x, y)
- s * (s + 1) * m ^ 2 * ((m * x + n) - i * m * y) ^ (- 2) * f * open-interval@(x, y)

para.p: Combining the above expressions we get

Math.text: (((partial-differential _ x) ^ 2)@(f) + (partial-differential _ y) ^ 2) * open-interval@(x, y) = (m ^ 2 * f * open-interval@(x, y)) cdot (2 * s ^ 2 * (absolute-value@(m * tau + n)) ^ (- 2) + 2 * s ^ 2 * (absolute-value@(m * tau + n)) ^ (- 2))
(((partial-differential _ x) ^ 2)@(f) + (partial-differential _ y) ^ 2) * open-interval@(x, y)

+ s * (s - 1) * y ^ (- 2) * f * open-interval@(x, y)

+ 2 * s ^ 2 * i * m * y ^ (- 1) * ((m * x + n) - i * m * y) ^ (- 1) * f * open-interval@(x, y)
absent = (m ^ 2 * f * open-interval@(x, y)) cdot (2 * s ^ 2 * (absolute-value@(m * tau + n)) ^ (- 2) + 2 * s ^ 2 * (absolute-value@(m * tau + n)) ^ (- 2))
absent = (m ^ 2 * f * open-interval@(x, y)) cdot (2 * s ^ 2 * (absolute-value@(m * tau + n)) ^ (- 2) + 2 * s ^ 2 * (absolute-value@(m * tau + n)) ^ (- 2))
(+ s * (s - 1) * y ^ (- 2) * f * open-interval@(x, y)) - 4 * s ^ 2 * m ^ 2 * (absolute-value@(m * tau + n)) ^ (- 2) * f * open-interval@(x, y)
(+ s * (s - 1) * y ^ (- 2) * f * open-interval@(x, y)) - 4 * s ^ 2 * m ^ 2 * (absolute-value@(m * tau + n)) ^ (- 2) * f * open-interval@(x, y)
absent = s * (s - 1) * y ^ (- 2) * f * open-interval@(x, y)
absent = s * (s - 1) * y ^ (- 2) * f * open-interval@(x, y)

para.p: Thus

Math.text: Delta _ H * f * open-interval@(x, y) = s * (s - 1) * f * open-interval@(x, y)

para.p: i.e.,

Math.text: Delta _ H * f = s * (s - 1) * f
